mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (email, password, name, phone, role, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{role}, false, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT id, email, password, name, phone, role, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at FROM member WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT id, email, password, name, phone, role, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
